name: PARASIGHT
description:
THE EARTH PLANET...

decillion percent of the world or even lesser!

Parasight is a 2D RPG Soulslike game for Windows!

 You have to kill your enemies to survive!

The story is about after many creations of races, finally, the HUMAN race was born!

Humans become the best friend of all people because of their good adjectives!

but finally, the SOUL EXTRACT HUNTERS hunted a human! they extract the human soul & inject it into themselves. they gain really great power, but this power was more than to be controlled! so, they tried to kill themselves to extract their own souls!

in a short, a meteorite landed in Nevermore island and...

NO  ONE KNOW WHAT HAPPENED AFTER!

if you want to know it...

just download the Demo and join the Party!

BY THE WAY!

Artin awaits to introduce itself to you!
